verses.verse: We then, <S%G3767><s%> as workers <S%G4903><s%> together <S%G4903><s%> with him, beseech <S%G3870><s%> you also <S%G2532><s%> that you receive <S%G1209><s%> not the grace <S%G5485><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> in vain. <S%G2756><s%>

(For he said, <S%G3004><s%> I have heard <S%G1873><s%> you in a time <S%G2540><s%> accepted, <S%G1184><s%> and in the day <S%G2250><s%> of salvation <S%G4991><s%> have I succored <S%G997><s%> you: behold, <S%G2400><s%> now <S%G3568><s%> is the accepted <S%G2144><s%> time; <S%G2540><s%> behold, <S%G2400><s%> now <S%G3568><s%> is the day <S%G2250><s%> of salvation. <S%G4991><s%>)
Giving <S%G1325><s%> no <S%G3367><s%> offense <S%G4349><s%> in any <S%G3367><s%> thing, that the ministry <S%G1248><s%> be not blamed: <S%G3469><s%>

But in all <S%G3956><s%> things approving <S%G4921><s%> ourselves <S%G1438><s%> as the ministers <S%G1249><s%> of God, <S%G2316><s%> in much <S%G4183><s%> patience, <S%G5281><s%> in afflictions, <S%G2347><s%> in necessities, <S%G318><s%> in distresses, <S%G4730><s%>
In stripes, <S%G4127><s%> in imprisonments, <S%G5438><s%> in tumults, <S%G181><s%> in labors, <S%G2873><s%> in watchings, <S%G70><s%> in fastings; <S%G3521><s%>

By pureness, <S%G54><s%> by knowledge, <S%G1108><s%> by long-suffering, <S%G3115><s%> by kindness, <S%G5544><s%> by the Holy <S%G40><s%> Ghost, <S%G4151><s%> by love <S%G26><s%> unfeigned, <S%G505><s%>

By the word <S%G3056><s%> of truth, <S%G225><s%> by the power <S%G1411><s%> of God, <S%G2316><s%> by the armor <S%G3696><s%> of righteousness <S%G1343><s%> on the right <S%G1188><s%> hand and on the left, <S%G710><s%>
By honor <S%G1391><s%> and dishonor, <S%G819><s%> by evil <S%G1426><s%> report <S%G1426><s%> and good <S%G2162><s%> report: <S%G2162><s%> as deceivers, <S%G4108><s%> and yet true; <S%G227><s%>

As unknown, <S%G50><s%> and yet well <S%G1921><s%> known; <S%G1921><s%> as dying, <S%G599><s%> and, behold, <S%G2400><s%> we live; <S%G2198><s%> as chastened, <S%G3811><s%> and not killed; <S%G2289><s%>

As sorrowful, <S%G3076><s%> yet <S%G1161><s%> always <S%G104><s%> rejoicing; <S%G5463><s%> as poor, <S%G4434><s%> yet <S%G1161><s%> making <S%G4148><s%> many <S%G4183><s%> rich; <S%G4148><s%> as having <S%G2192><s%> nothing, <S%G3367><s%> and yet possessing <S%G2722><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> things.
O you Corinthians, <S%G2881><s%> our mouth <S%G4750><s%> is open <S%G455><s%> to you, our heart <S%G2588><s%> is enlarged. <S%G4115><s%>
You are not straitened <S%G4729><s%> in us, but you are straitened <S%G4729><s%> in your <S%G5216><s%> own bowels. <S%G4698><s%>
Now <S%G1161><s%> for a recompense <S%G489><s%> in the same, <S%G846><s%> (I speak <S%G3004><s%> as to my children, <S%G5043><s%>) be you also <S%G2532><s%> enlarged. <S%G4115><s%>

Be you not unequally <S%G2086><s%> yoked <S%G2086><s%> together <S%G2086><s%> with unbelievers: <S%G571><s%> for what <S%G5101><s%> fellowship <S%G3352><s%> has righteousness <S%G1343><s%> with unrighteousness? <S%G458><s%> and what <S%G5101><s%> communion <S%G2842><s%> has light <S%G5457><s%> with darkness? <S%G4655><s%>

And what <S%G5101><s%> concord <S%G4857><s%> has Christ <S%G5547><s%> with Belial? <S%G955><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> what <S%G5101><s%> part <S%G3310><s%> has he that believes <S%G4103><s%> with an infidel? <S%G571><s%>

And what <S%G5101><s%> agreement <S%G4783><s%> has the temple <S%G3485><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> with idols? <S%G1497><s%> for you are the temple <S%G3485><s%> of the living <S%G2198><s%> God; <S%G2316><s%> as God <S%G2316><s%> has said, <S%G2036><s%> I will dwell <S%G1774><s%> in them, and walk <S%G1704><s%> in them; and I will be their God, <S%G2316><s%> and they shall be my people. <S%G2992><s%>

Why <S%G1352><s%> come <S%G1831><s%> out from among <S%G3319><s%> them, and be you separate, <S%G873><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> the Lord, <S%G2962><s%> and touch <S%G680><s%> not the unclean <S%G169><s%> thing; and I will receive <S%G1523><s%> you.
And will be a Father <S%G3962><s%> to you, and you shall be my sons <S%G5207><s%> and daughters, <S%G2364><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> the Lord <S%G2962><s%> Almighty. <S%G3841><s%>
